title: Rational Functions - Asymptotes and Zeros - Part A

content.question: Part A Determine equations for all vertical asymptotes of the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math>, or state that no vertical asymptotes exist.

frqParts.text: Part A Determine equations for all vertical asymptotes of the graph of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>t</mi> </math>, or state that no vertical asymptotes exist.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
